item.title: Getting Started with Semantic Kernel
item.description: Hi Everyone! With this post, I am starting a new series about Semantic Kernel. Over the time, I will updated this page with links to individual posts : This Post - Getting Started with Semantic Kernel In this post, we will try to understand the following concepts: What is Semantic Kernel? How to use Semantic Kernel? Apart from that, we will also try to touch the concept of LLM and Prompt Engineering.
